New Records: Denmark and England have played each other a total of 22 times across all competitive and non-competitive fixtures.
England have won 13 matches, Denmark 4, with 5 draws.
Key Match Events: The most recent three meetings have been competitive, including two Nations League encounters and the Euro 2020 semi-final.
England won the Euro 2020 semi-final 2-1 after extra time, with Harry Kane scoring the decisive goal.
Pre-Game Insights: Gareth Southgate's men kick-started their Euro 2024 campaign with a 1-0 victory over Serbia.
Denmark drew 1-1 with Slovenia in their opening match.
Oliver Thomas previews the upcoming match, noting the historical rivalry and current forms of both teams.
